name: Mini War (Bloak)
description:
This is a world of colors only, no troops, no money. The setup is totally random, but with some strategy, you can conquer the world with ease.

Controls:

top 2 buttons: settings (click on numbers to change them); help (includes gameplay explanation)

bottom 3 buttons: play/pause; fast forward; restart (new map)

Android users: please download the apk file below.
